001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.update.providers;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.ServiceConfiguration;
005
006import java.time.Duration;
007import java.util.Optional;
008
009public record DynamicDnsConfiguration(Configuration context)
010        implements ServiceConfiguration {
011    public Duration getTimeout() {
012        return Duration.parse("PT" + context().getString("timeout").orElse("30s"));
013    }
014
015    public Duration getTtl() {
016        return Duration.parse("PT" + context().getString("ttl").orElse("60s"));
017    }
018
019    public Optional<DnsKeyConfiguration> getKey() {
020        return context.getObjectAs("key", Configuration::new).map(DnsKeyConfiguration::new);
021    }
022}
